A Post Format is a piece of meta information that can be used by a theme to customize its presentation of a post. The Post Formats feature provides a standardized list of formats that are available to all themes that support the feature.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a WordPress page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many pages as you like! Pages are different from posts in that they are not date sensitive.  They are for static content like and about page, services page or contact page. Here at StephanieHellwig.com, we believe in you!  That is why we have an extensive library of support documents to help you get your site up right away.  We want to save you lots of time and frustration.  We are here if you need us along the way.  Just visit our support area to watch videos, read tutorials and if you are still feeling stuck. . . just send us a message. Did you know we have a youtube channel as well?  That’s right!   We publish a visual walk through of almost all the tutorials we write here at StephanieHellwig.com.  Still stuck?  We also have a facebook group where you can gain access to a community of designers, developers and other content creators like yourself!  The StephanieHellwig team is actively answering questions and offering helpful tips and tricks in the group on a weekly basis!  We even have a free webinar each month to answer your specific questions and help you be successful with your WordPress website. When you purchase a premium WordPress theme from StephanieHellwig.com you are in good hands.

item.title: Page Layouts
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded:
Below are some post/page layouts that are available.  You can set your global layout option in the Genesis Theme settings from the menu on the left.  You can also change the layout for a specific page or post right in the editor screen.  If you do not see the layout option, check the box beside layout settings in the screen options. These are our favorite options:
  • Content/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Content
  • Full Width Content

item.title: WPForms Preview
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded:
This is the WPForms preview page. All your form previews will be handled on this page.

The page is set to private, so it is not publicly accessible. Please do not delete this page :) .

item.title: Contact Page
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a contact page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where to contact you. [wpforms id="532"] * This contact form was built with WPForms a nice drag and drop form option.   If you are looking for a more robust form option that offers conditional logic you might really enjoy Gravity Forms.

item.title: Column Classes
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Sample Post With a Blockquote
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded:
This is an example of a WordPress post, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many posts as you like! Posts are ordered by date in reverse chronological order.  You can organize Posts into categories.  You can create category archive pages and the StephanieHellwig.com themes all come with an index page template specifically designed for thumbnail view of your posts organized by your specific categories! Here is a block quote:
Stephanie is an absolute delight to work with! She's extremely hard-working and puts in all her efforts to make your site the way you want it to be. My ideas literally came to life because of her and I couldn't be more happier with how my site turned out. She listens intently, pays close attention to detail, and delivers what you want. PLUS she always makes sure you're satisfied with her work. You're definitely getting your money's worth with Stephanie - I'd hire her again in a heartbeat!  Aena Rizvi - ScrambledChefs.com
Here at StephanieHellwig.com, we believe in you!  That is why we have an extensive library of support documents to help you get your site up right away.  We want to save you lots of time and frustration.  We are here if you need us along the way.  Just visit our support area to watch videos, read tutorials and if you are still feeling stuck. . . just send us a message. Did you know we have a youtube channel as well?  That's right!   We publish a visual walk through of almost all the tutorials we write here at StephanieHellwig.com.  Still stuck?  We also have a facebook group where you can gain access to a community of designers, developers and other content creators like yourself!  The StephanieHellwig team is actively answering questions and offering helpful tips and tricks in the group on a weekly basis!  We even have a free webinar each month to answer your specific questions and help you be successful with your WordPress website. When you purchase a premium WordPress theme from StephanieHellwig.com you are in good hands.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.
This is an example of a nested threaded comment which is new in WordPress 2.7. This is where you can reply to a comment that was previously made, and visually makes reading comments to much easier.

This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.

Did you know we have a youtube channel as well?  That’s right!   We publish a visual walk through of almost all the tutorials we write here at StephanieHellwig.com.  Still stuck?  We also have a facebook group where you can gain access to a community of designers, developers and other content creators like yourself!  The StephanieHellwig team is actively answering questions and offering helpful tips and tricks in the group on a weekly basis!  We even have a free webinar each month to answer your specific questions and help you be successful with your WordPress website. When you purchase a premium WordPress theme from StephanieHellwig.com you are in good hands.

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: stephanieH
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the formatting page for this theme. We're glad you are interested in using this and want to show you how elements look. Want to see what a blockquote looks like?
This is an example of a WordPress post, you could edit this to put information about your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many posts as you like in order to share with your readers what is on your mind.
Perhaps you'd like to see what an unordered list looks like?
  • Unordered list item #1
  • Unordered list item #2
  • Unordered list item #3
Or you'd prefer to see what an ordered list looks like?
  1. Ordered list item #1
  2. Ordered list item #2
  3. Ordered list item #3
Care to see what the headings look like?

Headline 1

Headline 2

Headline 3

Headline 4

Headline 5
Headline 6
How about the styling for threaded comments? Starting with Version 2.7, WordPress has support for threaded comments. This is where you reply to a comment that was previously made, and makes reading comments easier. Take a look at the comments of this post and you will see.
